verses.verse: And the Lord <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto Moses <S%H4872><s%>, Go <S%H935><s%> in unto Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%>: for I have hardened <S%H3513><s%> his heart <S%H3820><s%>, and the heart <S%H3820><s%> of his servants <S%H5650><s%>, that I might show <S%H7896><s%> these my signs <S%H226><s%> before him <S%H7130><s%>:

And that you may tell <S%H5608><s%> in the ears <S%H241><s%> of your son <S%H1121><s%>, and of your son <S%H1121><s%>'s son <S%H1121><s%>, what things I have done <S%H5953><s%> in Egypt <S%H4714><s%>, and my signs <S%H226><s%> which I have done <S%H7760><s%> among them <S%H3045><s%>; that you may know how that I am the Lord <S%H3068><s%>.

And Moses <S%H4872><s%> and Aaron <S%H175><s%> came in <S%H935><s%> unto Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%>, and said <S%H559><s%> unto him <S%H559><s%>, Thus says the Lord <S%H3068><s%> God <S%H430><s%> of the Hebrews <S%H5680><s%>, How long <S%H4970><s%> will you refuse <S%H3985><s%> to humble <S%H6031><s%> yourself before <S%H6440><s%> me <S%H5971><s%>? Let my people go <S%H7971><s%>, that they may serve me <S%H5647><s%>.

Else <S%H3588><s%>, if you refuse <S%H3986><s%> to let my people <S%H5971><s%> go <S%H7971><s%>, behold <S%H4279><s%>, to morrow will I bring <S%H935><s%> the locusts <S%H697><s%> into your coast <S%H1366><s%>:

And they shall cover <S%H3680><s%> the face <S%H5869><s%> of the earth <S%H776><s%>, that one cannot be able <S%H3201><s%> to see <S%H7200><s%> the earth <S%H776><s%>: and they shall eat <S%H398><s%> the residue <S%H3499><s%> of that which is escaped <S%H6413><s%>, which remains <S%H7604><s%> unto you from the hail <S%H1259><s%>, and shall eat <S%H398><s%> every tree <S%H6086><s%> which grows <S%H6779><s%> for you out of the field <S%H7704><s%>:

And they shall fill <S%H4390><s%> your houses <S%H1004><s%>, and the houses <S%H1004><s%> of all your servants <S%H5650><s%>, and the houses <S%H1004><s%> of all the Egyptians <S%H4714><s%>; which neither your fathers <S%H1><s%>, nor your fathers <S%H1><s%>' fathers <S%H1><s%> have seen <S%H7200><s%>, since the day <S%H3117><s%> that they were upon the earth <S%H127><s%> unto this day <S%H3117><s%>. And he turned <S%H6437><s%> himself <S%H3318><s%>, and went out from Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%>.

And Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%>'s servants <S%H5650><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto him <S%H4170><s%>, How long shall this man be a snare unto us <S%H582><s%>? Let the men go <S%H7971><s%>, that they may serve <S%H5647><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> their God <S%H430><s%>: know <S%H3045><s%> you not yet <S%H2962><s%> that Egypt <S%H4714><s%> is destroyed <S%H6><s%>?

And Moses <S%H4872><s%> and Aaron <S%H175><s%> were brought again <S%H7725><s%> unto Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%>: and he said <S%H559><s%> unto them <S%H3212><s%>, Go, serve <S%H5647><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%>: but who are they that shall go <S%H1980><s%>?

And Moses <S%H4872><s%> said <S%H559><s%>, We will go <S%H3212><s%> with our young <S%H5288><s%> and with our old <S%H2205><s%>, with our sons <S%H1121><s%> and with our daughters <S%H1323><s%>, with our flocks <S%H6629><s%> and with our herds <S%H1241><s%> will we go <S%H3212><s%>; for we must hold a feast <S%H2282><s%> unto the Lord <S%H3068><s%>.

And he said <S%H559><s%> unto them <S%H3068><s%>, Let the Lord be so with you <S%H7971><s%>, as I will let you go, and your little ones <S%H2945><s%>: look <S%H7200><s%> to it <S%H7451><s%>; for evil is before you <S%H6440><s%>.

Not so <S%H3212><s%>: go now you that are men <S%H1397><s%>, and serve <S%H5647><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%>; for that you did desire <S%H1245><s%>. And they were driven out <S%H1644><s%> from Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%>'s presence <S%H6440><s%>.

And the Lord <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto Moses <S%H4872><s%>, Stretch out <S%H5186><s%> your hand <S%H3027><s%> over the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%> for the locusts <S%H697><s%>, that they may come up <S%H5927><s%> upon the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%>, and eat <S%H398><s%> every herb <S%H6212><s%> of the land <S%H776><s%>, even all that the hail <S%H1259><s%> has left <S%H7604><s%>.

And Moses <S%H4872><s%> stretched forth <S%H5186><s%> his rod <S%H4294><s%> over the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%>, and the Lord <S%H3068><s%> brought <S%H5090><s%> an east <S%H6921><s%> wind <S%H7307><s%> upon the land <S%H776><s%> all that day <S%H3117><s%>, and all that night <S%H3915><s%>; and when it was morning <S%H1242><s%>, the east <S%H6921><s%> wind <S%H7307><s%> brought <S%H5375><s%> the locusts <S%H697><s%>.

And the locusts <S%H697><s%> went up <S%H5927><s%> over all the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%>, and rested <S%H5117><s%> in all the coasts <S%H1366><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%>: very <S%H3966><s%> severe <S%H3515><s%> were they <S%H6440><s%>; before them there were no such <S%H3651><s%> locusts <S%H697><s%> as they <S%H310><s%>, neither after them shall be such.

For they covered <S%H3680><s%> the face <S%H5869><s%> of the whole earth <S%H776><s%>, so that the land <S%H776><s%> was darkened <S%H2821><s%>; and they did eat <S%H398><s%> every herb <S%H6212><s%> of the land <S%H776><s%>, and all the fruit <S%H6529><s%> of the trees <S%H6086><s%> which the hail <S%H1259><s%> had left <S%H3498><s%>: and there remained <S%H3498><s%> not any green thing <S%H3418><s%> in the trees <S%H6086><s%>, or in the herbs <S%H6212><s%> of the field <S%H7704><s%>, through all the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%>.

Then Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%> called <S%H7121><s%> for Moses <S%H4872><s%> and Aaron <S%H175><s%> in hurry <S%H4116><s%>; and he said <S%H559><s%>, I have sinned <S%H2398><s%> against the Lord <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%>, and against you.

Now therefore forgive <S%H5375><s%>, I pray you my sin <S%H2403><s%> only this once <S%H6471><s%>, and entreat <S%H6279><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%>, that he may take away <S%H5493><s%> from me this death only <S%H4194><s%>.
And he went out <S%H3318><s%> from Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%>, and entreated <S%H6279><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%>.

And the Lord <S%H3068><s%> turned <S%H2015><s%> a mighty <S%H3966><s%> strong <S%H2389><s%> west <S%H3220><s%> wind <S%H7307><s%>, which took away <S%H5375><s%> the locusts <S%H697><s%>, and cast <S%H8628><s%> them into the Red <S%H5488><s%> sea <S%H3220><s%>; there remained <S%H7604><s%> not one <S%H259><s%> locust <S%H697><s%> in all the coasts <S%H1366><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%>.
But the Lord <S%H3068><s%> hardened <S%H2388><s%> Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%>'s heart <S%H3820><s%>, so that he would not let the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> go <S%H7971><s%>.

And the Lord <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto Moses <S%H4872><s%>, Stretch out <S%H5186><s%> your hand <S%H3027><s%> toward heaven <S%H8064><s%>, that there may be darkness <S%H2822><s%> over the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%>, even darkness <S%H2822><s%> which may be felt <S%H4959><s%>.

And Moses <S%H4872><s%> stretched forth <S%H5186><s%> his hand <S%H3027><s%> toward heaven <S%H8064><s%>; and there was a thick <S%H653><s%> darkness <S%H2822><s%> in all the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%> three <S%H7969><s%> days <S%H3117><s%>:

They saw <S%H7200><s%> not one <S%H376><s%> another <S%H251><s%>, neither rose <S%H6965><s%> any <S%H376><s%> from his place for three <S%H7969><s%> days <S%H3117><s%>: but all the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> had light <S%H216><s%> in their dwellings <S%H4186><s%>.

And Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%> called <S%H7121><s%> unto Moses <S%H4872><s%>, and said <S%H559><s%>, Go <S%H3212><s%> you serve <S%H5647><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%>; only let your flocks <S%H6629><s%> and your herds <S%H1241><s%> be stayed <S%H3322><s%>: let your little ones <S%H2945><s%> also go with you <S%H3212><s%>.

And Moses <S%H4872><s%> said <S%H559><s%>, you must give <S%H5414><s%> us <S%H3027><s%> also sacrifices <S%H2077><s%> and burnt offerings <S%H5930><s%>, that we may sacrifice <S%H6213><s%> unto the Lord <S%H3068><s%> our God <S%H430><s%>.

Our cattle <S%H4735><s%> also shall go <S%H3212><s%> with us <S%H6541><s%>; there shall not a hoof be left behind <S%H7604><s%>; for there must we take <S%H3947><s%> to serve <S%H5647><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> our God <S%H430><s%>; and we know <S%H3045><s%> not with what we must serve <S%H5647><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%>, until we come there <S%H935><s%>
But the Lord <S%H3068><s%> hardened <S%H2388><s%> Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%>'s heart <S%H3820><s%>, and he would <S%H14><s%> not let them go <S%H7971><s%>.

And Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto him <S%H3212><s%>, Get you from me <S%H8104><s%>, take heed to yourself see <S%H7200><s%> my face <S%H6440><s%> no more <S%H3254><s%>; for in that day <S%H3117><s%> you see <S%H7200><s%> my face <S%H6440><s%> you shall die <S%H4191><s%>.
And Moses <S%H4872><s%> said <S%H559><s%>, you have spoken <S%H1696><s%> well <S%H3651><s%>, I will see <S%H7200><s%> your face <S%H6440><s%> again no more <S%H3254><s%>.
